artifact.content: User dials a number to make a phone call
User picks up the phone to answer phone call
System Console validates�Administrator with a login name and password pair.
Administrator adds a user to the System.
Administrator removes the IP address and phone number from user account, sets account status as inactive.
Administrator sets account status as active.
Administrator sets account status as suspended if User account is overdue for 2 weeks or phone has problems and need to be taken out of service.
Administrator can add phone number to existing active account without a phone number.
Set user account as Ex-Employee
Change user information on the System such as IP address, billing address, billing plans associated with an account, account privilege, etc.
Administrator can perform system test to verify functionality of the system. Administrator may request such test at any time.
Ping user�s IP address to see if there is proper connection between the System and the user�s phone on a nightly basis.
Administrator can perform connectivity between a user and the System.
Administrator is able to set a value for the maximum number of calls allowed in the System.
The system keep track of the duration of each call, the date and time of the call is made.
Print monthly bill for the all users
Administrator is able to view user�s bill for any billing period.
Administrator records bill payment made by users.
Extra features supported by the System
User add/edit/remove phone numbers they would like to filter by calling Administrator
Two rates: 1. Office hours 2. Non-office hours and weekends. Manager account get 50% off from normal employee rates.
Allows Administrator to add new calling plan to the System
Administrator can make changes to the existing calling plans.
Phone numbers that start with 0 are dedicated to special numbers such as calling admin, voicemail, 911, etc.
All phone numbers are 4 digits in length.
A user friendly graphical interface to the System Console.
System should available at all time. Uptime is critical because user will not be able to make call if System is down.
System should be able to expand easily to be able to handle more users and higher connection capacity.
